ygData.msgSnippet: Liono, DeathStorm and Grimlock wern t headed for the Ark. You need to read your posts. ... Zardus lands outside the cave where energon readings were coming

Liono, DeathStorm and Grimlock wern't headed for the Ark. You need to read 
your posts.

::Zardus/DeathStorm/Prowl/Shredder/Mosquitor::

Zardus lands outside the cave where energon readings were coming from.

"Excelent. Reptilica, Bloodystrike, join us at my coordinates." He takes one 
of the cutting lasers from Nemesis and goes to work on the energon, his fuzor 
form protecting him from the harmfull efects.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm arrives at the alliance base, panting and swearing at himself for 
being outwitted by a maximal. He goes to the CR chambers for a fresh-up.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl looks from Iron Raptor to Plintissa. It was obvious that neither wanted 
to fire at each other. He sighs. "Why the preds, though, Plintissa?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder's already damaged form slams into a rock. Swearing, he pulls out his 
gun and fires at Dark One.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mosquitor's hand tightens its grip on his gun as he sees the battle in front 
of him. He opens a channel to Hell Beast.

"Leadership, the traitors are engaging with combat against each other. Shall 
I destroy them?"
